location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 58: William Digges Latouche, Resident at Bussora [Basra], to Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter William Digges Latouche discusses the movement of French ships in the Gulf. He informs Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire, that the Mercurywill not sail from Bussora [Basra] with Mr Sullivan, who arrived from Constantinople on 5 August, until either the French ships leave the Gulf or the ships from Bombay enter the Gulf.
